author: Staff Reporter
text:
Six persons who were sentenced to undergo life imprisonment by a court here on Wednesday for killing a man in 2008.

The prosecution case was that K. Mayilsamy (37) of Keelkullaveeranpatty in Mettur was killed by eight persons when he tried to prevent them from attacking Prakash, his relative on June 19, 2008.

Prakash and his father Raja were accused of killing S. Venkatesan in 2007. They were out on bail.

The police arrested S. Murthy (31), G. Mahendran (35), M. Kumar alias Senthilkumar (29), S. Seerangan (61), S. Sudhakar (36), Koothaiyan alias Perumal alias Mahi alias Maheswaran (36) and Saravanan alias Saravana Kumar. Another accused K. Senthil alias Senthilkumar is absconding and a warrant is pending against him. Saravanan died during the trial.

First Additional District Judge M. Jothiraman found the six guilty and sentenced them to undergo life imprisonment. A fine of Rs. 1,000 too was imposed on two of the accused and Rs. 500 for the other four.
title: Six get life imprisonment for killing man in 2008
